federatedCredentials.description: An array of federated credential objects.

name.description: The name of the federated credential.

subject.description: The subject of the federated credential. Must start with 'repo:${REPO}:'.

description.description: The description of the federated credential.

roleAssignments.description: An array of role assignment objects.

scope.description: The scope to create the role assignment at. Must start with '/subscriptions/${SUBSCRIPTION_ID}'.

role.description: The name or ID of the role to be assigned.
